website_summaries.verdict: Very simple flash diffuser that cleanly and securely fits onto any brand of flash unit that fits on a hot shoe.
pros: Extremely low price point for a diffuser that's made for simple photographs making use of a hot shoe flash
Small diffuser that's easy to carry to any photography job
Also includes a reflector on the opposite side for convenience
Photographers of any skill level can successfully deploy this model
cons: Doesn't diffuse the light as efficiently as a softbox style of diffuser, so not made for detailed studio work

customer_reviews.title: Great for Flash.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for getting the lighting just right. I love that I can really get the most out of my flash now. I use this on my Metz flash with my Pentax k-30 and it is the perfect combo. Here is a photo I took using this with my flash.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoejeepmom

customer_reviews.title: it is a pretty cool flash diffuser works great gives a bigger coverage ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a pretty cool flash diffuser works great gives a bigger coverage compared to the small card that most flashes come with. I like the make of it feels like good quality to last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: What a simple and useful tool!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is actually quite good - the materials and usefulness of this flash diffuser is pretty good. I like how it helps out when I'm in an area with tall ceilings or just when I'm outdoors and the surround trees give me unfavorable lighting conditions. This thinks works perfectly well with my Godox and my Sony a7iii. I would definitely recommend this as an additional tool to help you capture better photos when your surrounding areas aren't working well for you!
customer_reviews.author: Aloha NinjaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Last resort flash modifier
customer_reviews.text: I much prefer a solid diffuser. The best is the FStoppers disc design that fits over your flash head. But they are overpriced. I keep this in my lighting bag when going on site as a emergency/backup modifier, especially when ceilings are dark/colored/ or too high.
customer_reviews.author: inayat2012 on youtube

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little thing to have in your gear bag. Easy to use and it works for my purposes. I do real estate photography and use it outside for the most part on porches and balconies where there are hanging fans and or lighting fixtures, it stops those annoying shadows cast on walls and ceiling by the flash.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Puto

customer_reviews.title: Super handy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little diffuser. It won't change the entire world, but it will make your speedlight more useful. The light that I get from it is just soft enough to not look like a directional flash or light that is only bounced off a ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Ted80pTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I added this on as an afterthought and I'm glad I did! I've used this diffuser over and over, more so than the diffuser flash box. Works well in rooms when you aim the flash back over your head and bounce it off the ceiling. If also used the shiny side and bounced the flash off an over head reflector. Work great either way.
customer_reviews.author: Multi-Interest guy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely simple & extremely useful.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Made sturdy, with a solid elastic band. It's amazing the difference such a simple device can make. Bounces the light from a flash in a very even and soft way. If I don't have an umbrella on hand, this is my go-to diffusing tool. The low price is a great upside and the quality doesn't suffer from it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gelfman

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flash reflector with another one as a bundle with a flash. It was worth get both with the flash for different lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I've used MANY diffusers, paper, Gary Font,  and really like this one.
customer_reviews.text: I've used MANY diffusers, paper, Gary Font, and really like this one. If it was a little more narrow it wouldn't get as curled up in my smaller photobag. Then again the curve helps it deflect wider. ;)
customer_reviews.author: skyrunr

customer_reviews.title: This little fan. . .
customer_reviews.text: Great little product! Either side. Use this all the time. Great for portrait work in a variety of shooting applications. I'd recommend. Always a winner! Never regretted buying this little fan. You could say. . .I'm a fan of this little. . .well you know. Oh by the way. . .I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Watson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweght, and very portable and double-sided
customer_reviews.text: This reflector is awesome. One side is a white card diffuser and the other is a foil reflector. Both sides adjust the flash just right not creating any hot spots. Even illumination throughout the picture. It's very portable, lying flat in my backpack. The quality of the construction means that I'll be using this for a long time. Nice work, especially for the price. I couldn't make one as nice for this price.
customer_reviews.author: A P M

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice addition to my photojournalism took kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice addition to my photojournalism took kit. It provides a nice fill flash and helps with that awful shadow one gets when shooting in a darker area. Because of its size I have had it slip off my flash a couple of times during assignments that involved photographing in a crowd or moving quickly to various locations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: puts out a LOT of light
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use it for bird photography, and it works great, but I do have to dial the flash down quite a bit. This addition helps when you don't want to carry an extension arm around in the field. My consideration of using for group and individual photos, makes this far more suitable. Definitely has a lot of optional uses... Love IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT - VERY REASONABLE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that takes harsh shadows out of you flash photography. It is by no means the only way of doing that but it is a very simple solution for less than $10!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Moushegh Tourian

customer_reviews.title: they work good.. but this is tops
customer_reviews.text: OMG..are you kidding me??? So cheap yet so effective. I'm at a wedding shoot right now. If you know how to manipulate your ttl on your speedlight,.....can someone say...no shadows? My first 5 star rating on Amazon.com. I bought these to to set up on two triggers for another speed light for portraits and this wedding today...whoa...I've used soft boxes,big dome looking diffusers and even the small box n go speed light difuser..they work good..but this is tops.....great idea!! A must buy for every photographer
customer_reviews.author: JustLes

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a little panel thing that has elastic on it for your hot flash? Well, it does what it says it does and it's pretty well made for what it is. That's about it. It fits in my small camera bag, which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: This Will Work For You
customer_reviews.text: This product works well on my Nikon Speedlite and probably will on most because it's so simple. It's decent quality, but a little hard to pack because of it's shape. I also use a plastic cap diffuser, and between the two I can cover most close up situations, all for about $15. Sure I recommend it, making my own felt like an 8th grade science project gone wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J.

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser for the $$ can’t beat it
customer_reviews.text: I had to shoot my friends daughters wedding, I took over 1300 photos, inside the tent using the diffuser made a big difference. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just place it around the flash unit head and start using. Took over 700 portrait images with it at an event.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilyn Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Great behind the subject fill and main light tool!  Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Silly me ... I thought it was two separate units but its reversible which makes it even better. Works great for that added back of the subject fill light when the subject is not next to a wall. Such a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Accent Photography

customer_reviews.title: Nice that it has a shiny and a flat white ...
customer_reviews.text: Stays in place. Nice that it has a shiny and a flat white side though my tests showed no difference in the amount of light bounced. The band is a little tight on larger flash heads and the bottom of the bounce card obscures the tilt angle reading. All in all still a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: thank you thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This flash diffuser is excellent for something on the fly. I covered two parties with it and it worked nicely. Both buildings had high ceilings but it gave me a sufficient "catch light" in the subjects as while dispersing plenty of light to everything else. It is a little big in comparison to my sb-600 but it did the job nicely. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those tools that is really fun to play with and can really make a difference in the quality of your images. Once you start playing with light you come to realize that it is really the key to capturing great images. Anything that helps you control that aspect is a good tool to have. I'm happy with this product and happy with the service. Would buy again/recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 6 months and I continue to use it daily for real estate photography. However I use it in FRONT of the flash to throw the lighting up and away form the room & it creates nice even lighting (for the most part). I replaced the elastic with velcro pretty early on, as the elastic is fairly thin & doesn't do much to hold the diffuser firmly in place. For the price it's a good tool.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works better than nothing, but, not much better than nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Meh!!! Works better than nothing, but, not much better than nothing. Testing this I notice that the fill function you would expect from the reflector is much less than anticipated. When bouncing off of the ceiling, the bounce flash by itself worked fine in a small room, could hardly tell the difference using this device, as compared to just bouncing the flash off of the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: FantasymanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: escape artist
customer_reviews.text: this is a simple bounce card and I appreciate the 2 sided aspect, but it fell off 5 times while I was working with it, just because of wind or being jostled while not in use. The light quality turned out well, but I think I will stick to my velcro ones.
customer_reviews.author: J & D Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Not a necessary necessity but it works
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice a difference at all in my pictures so I felt I wasted money but the quality is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: @fivefreespirits

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for its price, only returning cause im returning the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Day 1986

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking pictures
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diffuser, pictures are very nice like when I used to bounce off the ceiling, but now they add a little light on the subject. I find I'm using the silver side more with flash compensation to +0.7, the white looks a little too much like the pop up flash. I really recommend this diffuser, it will make your pictures look much better.
customer_reviews.author: rickyny

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it a lot but the few time I did it works great
customer_reviews.author: Tonsha

customer_reviews.title: Great camera flash bounce
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for brother as a little gift. He loved it and if I am using my big flash, I almost always use this bounce.
customer_reviews.author: TxGirl

customer_reviews.title: Considerable Improvement in Portraits.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy and inexpensive way to soften the light from an external flash. Does a good job of bouncing some light off the reflector, and letting some light bounce off the ceiling. Beware of bouncing light off non-white ceilings and walls. May not be very durable. The Stofen units are easier to use, more expensive, and doesn't give as much ceiling bounce, but are used by most pros. This unit is a good introduction to flash modifiers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very good value. Ultra portable.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars for superb value and usability, and portability. . 1 star off due to overexposed shots so I had to stop down the flash. Also not as soft as GF lightspeed, but not that bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rokzi

customer_reviews.title: I like this diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for taking indoor photos of people at events! It helps give faces that would otherwise be too light some contrast. Gives your flash a more professional look also from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, I have two of these now that fit on all four flashes that I have of this type. Not rocket science, does what it does, often more control than just a ceiling and/or wall for bounce, so it is great for outdoors for fill without hauling a big load. White side softens shadows just slightly more than metallic side with a very slight reduction in exposure. Handheld by an assistant with either side, is surprising handy for a small sunlight reflector to fill facial shadows or create a catch-light source.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Kent

customer_reviews.title: BOUNCES FLASH PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for night event and it really helped light my subjects better!
customer_reviews.author: joseph hirt

customer_reviews.title: Best diffuser for event photography
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for event photography if you work with a light assistant person. Trust me, it will give the best result ever!!
customer_reviews.author: jeremias

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I usually use it for filling in outdoors when I’m not carrying reflector screens or something bulky and it works great. It fits in any backpack or camera bag easily ( a shoulder bag). Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Matias

customer_reviews.title: Helps with getting fabulous even light !
customer_reviews.text: This really does help tremendously with bouncing light so you can achieve great exposure in your photos .. would definitely buy again .
customer_reviews.author: faydra c.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and throws light forward while the flash is pointed straight up!
customer_reviews.text: The flash diffuser softbox works great with an external flash. It reflects light up and straight out from the external flash that fills in shadows while the flash is tilted straight up. It works much better that using the flash pointed up by itself, and is way better than aiming the flash towards an object.
customer_reviews.author: Rolla Gravett

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good! Also because it’s so small it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this at an indoor party with low lighting. Works pretty good! Also because it’s so small it makes it easy and comfortable to take photos indoors without pulling out the big diffusers when I’m in an informal photo opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Buttaflyj

customer_reviews.title: Love using it in situations where I'm shooting bands with ...
customer_reviews.text: Love using it in situations where I'm shooting bands with poor lighting and not shooting flash right into musicians eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second one for my second flash. Really throws the flash forward evenly and avoids harsh light.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Using with my Zomei external flash. Slips right over the flash with an elastic band. Dual sided, inexpensive and can be easily carried in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gagliano

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the built in card!
customer_reviews.text: For a long time I was using the much smaller built in cards on my speed lights. This one works so much better providing a wider angle of diffused soft light.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Izquierdo

customer_reviews.title: Love this diffuser.
customer_reviews.text: Should have purchased this a year ago. Solved my hard light problem in different settings. Works really nicely indoors or out, reduces harsh shadows dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: TAVAN

customer_reviews.title: Not much help.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this on my Canon flashes (580 EX & 430 EX attached to a Canon 5D MkIII and a Canon 7D). It fits fine, but I don't see the advantage when taking photos. It doesn't bounce enough light. It would be better if you could angle the reflective surface, but you can't. I'm keeping it because I would actually loose money returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Woodshop Man

customer_reviews.title: Great value light modifier
customer_reviews.text: Extremely simple product, and it's bendable to modify it. Feels sturdy for what it is, and easy to fold flat for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Man

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bang for buck out of this
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bang for buck out of this! Can easily move around on the flash, but what do you expect for the price? A+
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: Nice bounce flash reflector
customer_reviews.text: You can make these yourself , but this was not expensive and worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: The Great Labouski.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the picture quality of the Zoom lens
customer_reviews.text: I liked the picture quality of the Zoom lens, it proved to be just as effective as those equipped with a stabiliser. I found the pangshi reflector to be an enhancer of the flash. This way one does not need a bigger flasher
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight. Fits anywhere. It is what it is. Not enough diffusion for front-facing shots in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but very functional
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flash accessory. This fits on my flash, sb-5000 just fine. And soften and spreads the light out, to great effect. Perfect transaction, great price, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Randy Frieder

customer_reviews.title: Great Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: The diffuser is great, reflects my flash well and spreads the light evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Whorton

customer_reviews.title: Not too thrilled
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, I've seen other products that are better. I guess you get what you pay for. I tried to bend these a little bit as they are too straight but they're not bendable. :(
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off and slip into ...
customer_reviews.text: Review on pangshi Two-sided Flash Diffuser. Easy to put on and take off and slip into your camera bag quickly. Fits nice and snug on a SB-600. Thick and sturdy enough that it should remain rigid even after many uses. Only weak link I can see is the elastic band. This will eventually stretch out and not hold diffuser on the flash. But it's cheap enough that you can just get a spare or replacement when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Meleman

customer_reviews.title: I've used this a couple of times and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a couple of times and I have no complaints! This is what I needed to photograph some shelter animals using flash without a lot of fuss. Hint: Put your camera into quiet mode!
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of light...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and just right the amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment. It can deff make a noticeable difference in your photos. I love mines and I will be ordering another as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: TashiMun2

customer_reviews.title: Nice tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fits tight- doesn't fall off and offers white or shiny reflector. I use it on a canon speedlite.
customer_reviews.author: Steve West

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Did not serve the purpose of providing a shade when using it.
customer_reviews.author: items buyer

customer_reviews.title: A great bounce flash solution
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job bouncing flash, is sturdily built, attaches to my flash unit easily, and stores flat. What's not to love!
customer_reviews.author: Owen T Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: but the quality is good, come in on a bag sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, but the quality is good, come in on a bag sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Diego DNeo

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any photographer.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. Definitely recommend buying this. Super easy for traveling and having at all times. I keep it in the laptop slot on my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hels

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: this is very to use. I like the 2 sided usage. It directs the lights towards your subject. This reflects the light, and is not a diffuser. I liek the esae of putting this on to the flash unit.
customer_reviews.author: seldom satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Its a good diffuser that serves its required limited purpose
customer_reviews.text: Its a good diffuser that serves its required limited purpose, can't expect too much in this price range or technically not possible while relying completely on these. What i really want to try it out when i'll be outside
customer_reviews.author: dehran

customer_reviews.title: compace, small, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy, compact, and portable. fits easy in my small camera bag for quick use. Not as snug of a fit as I would like and it slides around when a small bump occurs but the bounce is very nice. the ease of flipping it around for the style of flash is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hecht

customer_reviews.title: The quality and durability of this flash is awesome! I was a little sceptical because of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality and durability of this flash is awesome! I was a little sceptical because of the price, but it worked extremely well and I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: YoYo

customer_reviews.title: Professional Looking
customer_reviews.text: I usually use index cards rubber banded to my external flash, this is more effective and looks much more professional looking. I am a professional photographer and love the price and quality of this!
customer_reviews.author: gracie 54

customer_reviews.title: Pretty okay bounce card
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy material. Not very moldable but can be bent to shape the light a little better. Add velcro as this falls off all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MF-VA-DC-MD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My shots with a camera-mounted flash are now even better than when I used the Gary Phong devices.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ziady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it for every single shoot. Cant work without this one.
customer_reviews.author: rockymeister

customer_reviews.title: Very handy lightweight flash diffuser.
customer_reviews.text: Used with Nikon SB-500 flash in vertical position to soften flash. Worked great! Will purchase again to have an extra on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: but a waste of money just the same
customer_reviews.text: Elastic does not hold tight to the flash. Velcro would be much prefered. Cheap. Stays flat and therefore does not direct much light toward the subject. Cheap, but a waste of money just the same. I don't think that it's worth saving and I have a big closet I could throw it into.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Adman

customer_reviews.title: Does a Decent Job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for indoor portraits and close up outdoor portraits.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BOUNCE CARD
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I am not a fan of soft boxes, bounce cards, or diffusers requiring Velcro. The elastic on this product hold the piece in place. Two sides with differing material allow for lighting to be reflected in varying ways. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Previously, I'd been using one of those globular flash ...
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I'd been using one of those globular flash diffusers, similar to the Gary Fong. However this two-sided version, which is cheaper and fits in my camera bag, works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: You will be amazed with the difference in your photos(especially at this price ...
customer_reviews.text: The cheapest and easiest way to get your flash diffused and softened. The diffuser attaches with a tight rubber band about 1' and 1/2 thick. You will be amazed with the difference in your photos(especially at this price point). Quality seems very decent.
customer_reviews.author: Ramstore

customer_reviews.title: Does its job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Does the job it is supposed to do perfectly. I used it in a couple of events and got beautiful results. Very easy to put on and it stays in its place. It is supposed to work on any external flashes, and not in-built flashes.
customer_reviews.author: sudocool

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely, but I wish they used velcro for the strapping for better fit
customer_reviews.author: Chilibob

customer_reviews.title: Not beneficial for me, but is compact and may work for some
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this off and on for a while now. I honestly don't find it that beneficial and just use a diffuser that goes over the flash more than this though. I still take it with me everywhere though since it is very easy to transport in any bag and can be useful in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: JLovesBooks

customer_reviews.title: the diffuser works perfectly looks awesome. the only thing is that I thought they ...
customer_reviews.text: the diffuser works perfectly looks awesome. the only thing is that I thought they were 2 of them but it is only one. nothing bad about that. it works perfectly and it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a must. It diffuses and softens a flash just as well as a costlier softbox does and it's very portable.
customer_reviews.author: sarah kish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I wished I bought this earlier on
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I wished I bought this earlier on. I am getting better photo shots most of the time even in uneven lightning area.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Chia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and considering the price it’s worth 100%., Funny that We have magbounce for 54$.,
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. It's dirt cheap
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's dirt cheap. It fits on any flash. It has a silver and a white side. It bounces a huge amount of light. For the price and what it does, I have nothing but good things to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer J

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Still playing with the different sides and the distance of my subjects, etc. Overall happy with this. Gives off nice even light and eliminates shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t give the desired effect
customer_reviews.text: Price is right but no difference using it or not. Needs to allow for angle adjustment to be effective
customer_reviews.author: SD Pete

customer_reviews.title: Flash diffuser
customer_reviews.text: One of the cheapest (low price) things I've ever bought. It does a great job of diffusing the light for product shots. Packs flat so it goes in the camera bag with no problem. A great "hot spot" eliminator.
customer_reviews.author: HH Steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Throws a lot of light, but it can be rather harsh compared to my Gary Fong diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: TVTECH

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but really big. Don't think I'll be using it.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft lighting.
customer_reviews.text: It works. Idiot proof. Strap it to the flash head and angle it at 45 degrees. Nice soft lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Ride4Life

customer_reviews.title: Diffuses the light
customer_reviews.text: This flash diffuser does what it is intended for. It is just big and ugly when mounted on my nikon sb500
customer_reviews.author: Trang N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, very convenient when I do not want to get my whole setup out
customer_reviews.author: InvoluntarySoul

customer_reviews.title: Flash Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: This Diffuser is really something, with the soft lighting it gives you(White side) awesome!! I took that piece of plastic off my flash and will not be using it ever again. Thanks for a great product!! A++++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Hal P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diffuser for flashes that don't have one build in
customer_reviews.text: Awesome diffuser for flashes that don't have one build in! And it is a much larger diffuser for those that do have a built in. Worth the (small amount) of money
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Unit works as advertised - easily mounts onto my SB-600 flash and can be used ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit works as advertised - easily mounts onto my SB-600 flash and can be used to redirect soft diffused light from the flash. Reversible with backside being a flash enhancer reflective surface.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: just as good as the expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just as good as the expensive ones. Tired of being ripped off by the photography world, buy these and you won’t be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and useful
customer_reviews.text: The difference between a well and evenly exposed photograph and a partially lit one (specially when you are taking multiple photos in succession... is this cheap diffuser.

product_meta.title: pangshi Flash Diffuser Reflector Two-Sides Silver/White Bounce for Speedlite Nikon SB-600, SB-800, SB-900, Canon 380EX 430EX 550EX 580EX Vivita Flash Sunpack Nissin Sigma Sony Pentax Olympus Yongnuo
feature_bullets: For soft indirect flash light use the pure white size.
For greater range and spectral highlights use the silver size.
It helps to reduce hard background shadows and eliminates the annoying red eye effect.
Please understand that this goods is one reflector with two sides(white/silver), not two reflectors
